; Tue, 28 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 我国工业企业利润连续3个月正增长（新数据 新看点）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/28/nw.D110000renmrb_20231128_2-01.htm
;Tuesday, November 28, 2023
; ;

;This newspaper, Beijing, November 27th  (Reporter Liu Zhiqiang) On November 27th, the National Bureau of Statistics released Industrial enterprise profit data: In October, the profits of industrial enterprises above designated size nationwide increased by 2.7% year-on-year, achieving positive growth for three consecutive months, and the efficiency of industrial enterprises continued to improve.

;

;The cumulative revenue of industrial enterprises turned to growth. Industrial production has grown steadily, and product sales rates have remained above 97% for four consecutive months, driving continued improvement in corporate revenue. From January to October, the operating income of industrial enterprises above designated size increased by 0.3% year-on-year, turning from flat to growth from January to September. Among them, the operating income of industrial enterprises above designated size increased by 2.5% year-on-year in October, and the growth rate accelerated by 1.3 percentage points from September, rising for four consecutive months.

;

;Profits of the three major categories have all rebounded, and more than 70% of industries have improved profits. From January to October, the profits of the electricity, heat, gas and water production and supply industry increased by 40% year-on-year, and the growth rate accelerated by 1.3 percentage points. From January to October, among the 41 major industrial sectors, 30 industries saw their profit growth accelerate or decrease at a narrower rate than from January to September, or turn from a decline to an increase.

;

;Profits in the raw material and consumer goods industries continued to improve. As downstream demand continues to recover, product prices in the raw material industry have generally rebounded and revenue growth has accelerated. In October, the profits of the raw material manufacturing industry increased by 22.9% year-on-year, continuing to maintain rapid growth and contributing the most to the growth of industrial profits above designated size. Benefiting from the continued effects of policies to expand domestic demand and promote consumption, the consumer market is gradually recovering. In October, profits from the consumer goods manufacturing industry increased by 2.2% year-on-year, increasing for three consecutive months.

;

;Profits from the equipment manufacturing industry continue to grow. From January to October, profits in the equipment manufacturing industry increased by 1.1% year-on-year. The profits of the equipment manufacturing industry accounted for 35.1% of the profits of designated industries, an increase of 3.1 percentage points year-on-year.

;The exquisite paintings hanging on the wall, the bright scenery of swaying green trees outside the window... Looking closer, it turned out to be a projection picture. In Jimi Technology Co., Ltd., located in Chengdu High-tech Zone, Sichuan Province, "a light" contains many technological elements.

;

;In May this year, XGIMI innovatively launched super mixed light technology. "This technology combines laser and LED light sources into one, complementing each other and breaking the technical bottleneck of a single solid-state light source." Zhong Bo, chairman of Jimi Technology, said that currently super mixed light technology has been applied to new products to provide users with better Good movie viewing experience. Technological breakthroughs pay off over time. Since 2020, XGIMI has invested more than 900 million yuan in R&D and currently has more than 860 patents.

;

;The development history of Jimi is the epitome of Chengdu’s strengthening of technological innovation and accelerating the development of strategic emerging industries represented by the electronic information industry. Ding Xiaobin, director of the Chengdu Municipal Science and Technology Bureau, introduced that Chengdu is focusing on the development of strategic emerging industries. Chengdu has adopted methods such as the "unveiling the list system" and the "horse racing system" to support enterprises to take the lead in carrying out original and leading scientific and technological research, promote scientific and technological innovation and the transformation of scientific and technological achievements, and enrich The growth soil for strategic emerging industries.

;

;In July this year, "Several Policies and Measures to Further Effectively Promote the Transformation of Scientific and Technological Achievements in Chengdu" was issued, focusing on building a pilot platform for the transformation of scientific and technological achievements, creating an ecological cluster of achievement transformation services, and improving the absorption and transformation of corporate achievements. In 10 aspects including capabilities, 28 specific policies and measures were proposed to improve the implementation and transformation rate of scientific and technological achievements. Since the beginning of this year, Chengdu has added 7 new national-level science and technology innovation platforms, bringing the total to 146.

;

;With precision machines running and skilled production personnel operating, Chengdu Haiguang Integrated Circuit Design Co., Ltd. located in Chengdu High-tech Zone is busy with production. Providing incubation space carriers and coordinating bank financial support... When the company first settled in, it benefited from the good innovation ecology created by the high-tech zone. At present, the high-end processor chips produced by the company have been recognized by the market, driving the coordinated development of small and medium-sized enterprises in the industry chain. "We will continue to increase project support and continue to improve the industrial ecology." said Yang Tianyuan, director of the Platform Innovation Department of the Electronic Information Industry Bureau of Chengdu High-tech Zone.

;

;In order to solve the loan problems often faced by technology-based small and medium-sized enterprises, Chengdu Science and Technology Bureau and financial institutions jointly developed "Technology Innovation Loan", relying on the risk sharing compensation credit financing model of "bank + government + guarantee". Give full play to the amplifying role of fiscal science and technology funds, enhance the support of financial institutions for technology-based small and medium-sized enterprises, and help enterprises unleash their innovative vitality. As of October this year, "Science and Technology Innovation Loan" has issued a total of 10,045 loans, with a loan amount of 31.255 billion yuan, and has cultivated more than 30 companies listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange, Shenzhen Stock Exchange, Beijing Stock Exchange, and Hong Kong Stock Exchange.

;

;“Since this year, Chengdu has been continuously optimizing and adjusting the industrial ecosystem and industrial chain system, laying out 8 industrial ecosystems including electronic information, digital economy, green and low carbon, focusing on integrated circuits, high-end software and operating systems, etc. 28 key industrial chains." Pu Bin, deputy director of the Chengdu Municipal Bureau of Economy and Information Technology, introduced that basic areas such as integrated circuits and smart terminal cores follow the idea of ​​"complementing manufacturing, strengthening design, and extending the chain" to build a solid foundation for industrial development; new Characteristic and advantageous fields such as display and software will enhance the level of industrial development; strategic leading fields such as industrial Internet and satellite Internet will seize development opportunities.

;

;Clear industry frontier trends, clear strategic layouts of international and domestic chain master enterprises, and clear industrial technology routes... Chengdu adheres to the "eight clear" requirements to dynamically sort out target enterprises (projects) and analyze enterprise products before investment Whether the type, technical route, etc. interact with the upstream and downstream of the local electronic information industry, and accurately select the target. At present, Chengdu has gathered many cutting-edge companies in the electronic information industry, such as BOE and Huawei HiSilicon, and has more than 1,800 electronic information companies, as well as more than 130 related universities and colleges and national-level innovation platforms.

;November 27, CCP Ding Xuexiang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council, met with President Tokayev of Kazakhstan in Astana.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Yan Yan

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency Astana November 27 Japan News    (Reporters Zheng Mingda and Zhang Jiye) From November 26th to 27th, Ding Xuexiang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council, visited Kazakhstan and met with Kazakh President Tokayev and Prime Minister Smyi respectively. Love, held talks with First Deputy Prime Minister Sklyar and co-chaired the 11th meeting of the China-Kazakhstan Cooperation Committee.

;

;When meeting with Tokayev, Ding Xuexiang conveyed President Xi Jinping’s cordial greetings and best wishes to President Tokayev. Ding Xuexiang said that under the personal planning and guidance of President Xi Jinping and Mr. President, China and Kazakhstan have established a permanent comprehensive strategic partnership, taken the lead in building a bilateral community with a shared future, and are at the forefront of promoting the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind. China and Kazakhstan are closely interdependent neighbors and strategic partners with a shared future. China is willing to work with Kazakhstan, guided by the implementation of the important consensus reached by the two heads of state, and with the promotion of high-quality joint construction of the "Belt and Road" as the main line, to jointly promote the China-Kazakhstan permanent comprehensive strategic partnership to a higher level and a broader space.

;

;Ding Xuexiang pointed out that China-Kazakhstan cooperation has a solid foundation, huge potential and broad prospects. China is willing to work with Kazakhstan to build a solid foundation of mutual trust, strengthen the alignment of development strategies, strengthen policy coordination, expand mutually beneficial cooperation, and help each other achieve their development goals. Both sides should deepen the connection between the "Belt and Road" initiative and the "Bright Road" new economic policy, actively explore new models and new paths for cooperation, deepen cooperation in culture, tourism, education, sports, youth, and local areas, so as to pass on the traditional friendship between China and Kazakhstan. . China is willing to work with Kazakhstan to promote the steady and long-term development of the China-Central Asia mechanism and jointly maintain long-term peace and stability in Central Asia.

;

;Tokayev asked Ding Xuexiang to convey his sincere greetings to President Xi Jinping. He said that Kazakhstan and China are a model of friendly cooperation between countries. Kazakhstan congratulates the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum on its complete success, firmly supports high-quality joint construction of the "Belt and Road", and welcomes Chinese enterprises to invest and operate in Kazakhstan. Kazakhstan is willing to work with China to deepen practical cooperation in various fields, resolutely combat the "three evil forces", intensify cultural exchanges and local cooperation, and promote the Kazakhstan-China permanent comprehensive strategic partnership to continuously achieve new results.

;

;When meeting with Smailov, Ding Xuexiang said that China and Kazakhstan are close and friendly neighbors, mutually trusting friends and partners for mutual success. This year, President Xi Jinping met with President Tokayev twice and reached a new consensus on deepening the China-Kazakhstan permanent comprehensive strategic partnership. China is willing to work with Kazakhstan to implement the important consensus reached by the two heads of state and promote the continuous development of China-Kazakhstan relations.

;

;Ding Xuexiang pointed out that China and Kazakhstan have similar development concepts, obvious complementary advantages, and broad prospects for cooperation. The two sides should continue to uphold the spirit of a community with a shared future, support each other on issues involving each other's core interests, jointly build the "Belt and Road" with high quality, expand connectivity, intensify people-to-people and cultural exchanges, and promote the upgrading of all-round mutually beneficial cooperation between China and Kazakhstan.

;

;Smailov said that Kazakhstan-China relations are based on profound friendship and solid mutual trust, with close high-level exchanges between the two countries and fruitful cooperation results. Kazakhstan firmly adheres to the one-China policy and is willing to work with China to further strengthen the Kazakhstan-China permanent comprehensive strategic partnership and continue to expand practical cooperation in various fields.

;

;On the 27th, Ding Xuexiang and Sklyar co-chaired the 11th meeting of the China-Kazakhstan Cooperation Committee. The meeting comprehensively and fully affirmed the progress made in practical cooperation between China and Kazakhstan in various fields, focusing on issues such as energy, economy and trade, finance, transportation, science and technology, humanities, environmental protection and security, fully exchanging views and planning the focus of cooperation in the next stage. After the meeting, Ding Xuexiang and Sklyar signed the "Minutes of the 11th Meeting of the China-Kazakhstan Cooperation Committee" and witnessed the signing of an agreement on mutual establishment of cultural centers, a protocol on phytosanitary requirements for Kazakhstan's fresh stone fruits exported to China and other cooperation document.

;Our newspaper, Beijing, November 27th  (Reporter Wu Qiuyu) In order to thoroughly implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China In accordance with the requirements of the Central Financial Work Conference, we will fully implement the "Opinions of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the State Council on Promoting the Development and Growth of the Private Economy", adhere to the "two unwavering principles", guide financial institutions to establish the concept of "equal treatment", and continue to strengthen the financial services of private enterprises. Services, recently, eight departments including the People's Bank of China, the State Administration of Financial Supervision, the China Securities Regulatory Commission, the State Administration of Foreign Exchange, the National Development and Reform Commission, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, the Ministry of Finance, and the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce jointly issued the "About Strengthening Financial Support Measures"  Notice on Assisting the Development and Growth of the Private Economy" (hereinafter referred to as the "Notice"), proposes 25 specific measures to support the private economy.

;

;The "Notice" clarifies the goals and priorities of financial services private enterprises. In terms of total amount, by formulating annual service targets for private enterprises and increasing the weight of services related to private enterprises in performance appraisals, we will increase financial support for private enterprises and gradually increase the proportion of loans to private enterprises. Structurally, we will increase support for key areas such as technological innovation, "specialization, specialization, specialization, green and low carbon, and industrial base reengineering projects, as well as for private small, medium and micro enterprises."

;

;The "Notice" emphasizes the need to proceed from the characteristics of private enterprises' financing needs and strive to unblock diversified financing channels such as credit, bonds, and equity. Banking financial institutions should increase their support for first-time loans and credit loans, actively carry out industrial chain and supply chain financial services, proactively provide fund continuity services to private enterprises, and not blindly suspend, suppress, withdraw or cut off loans, and at the same time, Promote development and prevent risks. Optimize the registration mechanism for private enterprise debt financing instruments, give full play to the role of private enterprise bond financing support tools, and expand the scale of private enterprise bond financing. Encourage and guide institutional investors to actively and scientifically allocate private enterprise bonds and increase investment in private enterprise bonds. Support the listing financing and mergers and acquisitions of private enterprises, give full play to the supporting service role of regional equity markets and equity investment funds for private enterprises, and expand the scale of equity financing for high-quality private enterprises. Increase the supply of foreign exchange facilitation policies and services, and support private enterprises in "going out" and "bringing in" by improving the level of facilitation of current account receipts and payments, improving cross-border investment and financing facilitation policies, and optimizing cross-border financial foreign exchange special services.

;

;The "Notice" proposes that monetary policy tools, fiscal incentives, insurance guarantees and other measures should be comprehensively used to enhance the enthusiasm of financial institutions in serving the private economy. Strengthen departmental cooperation, improve credit information sharing, financing guarantees, convenient bill discounting, accounts receivable rights confirmation, taxation and other supporting policies and mechanisms, and enhance the private economic and financial carrying capacity. Financial institutions should strengthen publicity and interpretation, and proactively push financial support policies, financial products and service information to private enterprises. Local financial management, development and reform, industry and information technology, finance and taxation, federation of industry and commerce and other departments have strengthened communication and coordination, strengthened supervision and guidance, and improved policy effectiveness.

;Tuesday, November 28, 2023

;;
;

;Data source: Ministry of Natural Resources
;Drawing: Wang Zheping

;
; ;

;Mineral resources are an important material basis for economic and social development. The exploration and development of mineral resources is related to the national economy, people's livelihood and national security. As of the end of 2022, 173 minerals have been discovered across the country; nearly 40% of my country's mineral reserves have increased in 2022... The recently released "China Mineral Resources Report (2023)" shows that my country is advancing the implementation of a new round of mineral prospecting breakthrough strategy The effect of the action is remarkable.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: "Intensify exploration efforts, strengthen scientific and technological research, and play a greater role in the new round of strategic actions for mineral prospecting breakthroughs." Based on ensuring the security of national energy resources, focusing on strengthening domestic exploration and development of important energy and mineral resources and increasing reserves and production, the natural resource system gathers the strength of all parties to fully promote a new round of strategic actions for mineral prospecting breakthroughs to ensure that the energy rice bowl is in its own hands. .

;

;;Comprehensively promote mineral prospecting;

;

;;Secure the energy job;

;

;A new round of mineral prospecting breakthrough strategy What is the point of action?

;

;“Mineral resources are the cornerstone of building a modern industrial system.” Tang Juxing, deputy chief geologist of the Institute of Mineral Resources of the Chinese Academy of Geological Sciences, said that the development and expansion of strategic emerging industries such as high-end equipment, new energy vehicles, and aerospace will It requires a large amount of copper, aluminum, lithium, manganese and other mineral resources for support. Taking the new energy automobile industry as an example, according to statistics, each vehicle requires an average of 53.2 kg of copper, 8.9 kg of lithium, 39.9 kg of nickel, 24.5 kg of manganese, 13.3 kg of cobalt, 66.3 kg of graphite, and 0.5 kg of rare earths.

;

;How is the progress of the new round of prospecting breakthrough strategic actions?

;

;A set of figures reveals the results: As of the end of 2022, 13 types of energy minerals, 59 types of metal minerals, 95 types of non-metallic minerals, and 6 types of water and gas minerals have been discovered across the country; since the "14th Five-Year Plan", 8 newly discovered oil fields with a capacity of 100 million tons, 11 gas fields with a capacity of 100 billion cubic meters, 157 large and medium-sized mineral deposits, 112 prospecting prospecting areas have been delineated, and 102 prospecting target areas have been submitted for commercial exploration. "Judging from the current situation, the new round of prospecting breakthrough strategic operations is progressing smoothly, with more than half of the time and half of the tasks, and it is expected to achieve the set goals." said Xiong Zili, director of the Geological Exploration Management Department of the Ministry of Natural Resources.

;

;Geological prospecting is very difficult. Ding Zhengjiang, Secretary of the Party Committee and Captain of the Sixth Geological Brigade of the Shandong Provincial Bureau of Geology and Mineral Resources, has a metaphor: "A drill bit with a diameter of only a few centimeters drills 3,000 meters deep into a formation with high temperature and pressure. , It's like hair stuck into the soil." Since its establishment in 1958, the Sixth Geological Brigade has accumulated a total drilling volume of 5 million meters and a cumulative identified gold resource of more than 2,810 tons. It is the geological team with the largest number of gold finds in the country. The Jiaodong area where it is located has also become the third largest gold-rich area in the world.

;

;The daily life of the prospecting team members is unusual - most of the work is carried out in the wild under difficult conditions, with benches used as beds, dense mosquitoes, and weathering the wind and rain. “You can’t find gold until you travel through the mountains,” Ding Zhengjiang said. “To ensure the authenticity of scientific research in geological prospecting, we must insist on going to wild mining areas, mountains and deserts to obtain first-hand information and original samples.” In the past year, , the Sixth Geological Brigade increased its exploration efforts and carried out deep gold resource potential investigation: a large gold deposit of nearly 50 tons was discovered in Xiluokou, Rushan, Shandong, and helped to detect a super-large lead-zinc mine in Hezhang, Guizhou, and is expected to be submitted 1 medium-sized graphite mine, and 9 gold prospecting target areas have been delineated... At the same time, the team has successively carried out prospecting operations in Xinjiang, Qinghai and other western provinces, and reached 3 mineral rights cooperation projects; in response to the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" initiative, successively Carry out mineral exploration work in Sudan, Nigeria and other countries.

;

;It is the hard work of the prospecting team that has supported my country’s status as the world’s largest consumer, producer and trading country of mineral resources. Xiong Zili said that only by fully implementing a new round of mineral prospecting breakthrough strategic actions can we firmly hold the energy job in our own hands.

;

; ; Relying on scientific and technological innovation;

;

;;Leading mineral exploration;

;

;Li Kuan, a young man born in the 1990s, has been working in Shandong The Sixth Geological Brigade of the Provincial Bureau of Geology and Mineral Resources has 8 years of experience in prospecting. Wearing orange field work clothes, after completing the safety inspection before construction, he quickly boarded the machine, "drilling holes, extracting cores, placing numbers..." Li Kuan described his work as "embroidering with a huge machine". Work: "Drilling rigs more than 10 meters high are scattered in the mountains, working 24 hours a day. It is clear at a glance what the underground stratigraphic structure is and what mineral resources are buried."

;

;"Traditional emphasis on the 'three major pieces of geology' '——Geological hammers, compasses and magnifying glasses. Nowadays, technical means and equipment such as aviation, aerospace, drones, shipboard, ground, and wells have become necessities." Luo Qingjun, director of the Equipment Department of the China Geological Survey, said that at present, China's marine geology The level of equipment in fields such as , earth observation, and experimental testing has ranked among the best in the world.

;

;"March into the Deep Earth". my country's mineral exploration is shifting from shallow to deep, from looking for outcrops to looking for ores in covered areas, from low mountainous areas to mid-to-high mountains and deep cutting areas, and it needs to rely more on scientific and technological innovation.

;

;Basic theoretical innovation plays an important role in prospecting breakthroughs. Tang Juxing is the chief scientist of national copper prospecting in the new round of prospecting breakthrough strategic action. He has been working in the hinterland of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau and adjacent areas for a long time. "We are exploring the establishment of copper mineralization models and exploration models, and theoretical guidance has achieved remarkable results in prospecting breakthroughs. Tibet Copper mines already account for more than 2/3 of my country’s copper resources.”

;

;Innovation in institutional mechanisms is a prominent feature of the new round of prospecting breakthrough strategic actions. In 2023, the Ministry of Natural Resources will continue to increase support, give full play to the role of various departments, regions and national geological exploration teams and scientific research units, establish an organization and implementation agency for the mineral prospecting action, and form an expert advisory committee and expert guidance group to provide guidance for the mineral prospecting action. Provide major technical consultation and on-site technical guidance for implementation.

;

;Xiong Zili introduced that the new round of mineral prospecting breakthrough strategic actions focuses on strategic minerals. According to the oil and gas minerals "stabilize the east, strengthen the central, accelerate the west, and expand the sea area", the solid minerals "explore deep in the east to find blind spots". , Stable resource supply, key breakthroughs in the western region, new resource bases" overall arrangement, set up basic survey areas, key survey areas, key exploration areas and important mine depths, and carry out basic geological surveys, strategic mineral exploration, mineral resource conservation and comprehensive Utilization, geological prospecting technological innovation and other work.

;

;;Strengthening policy support;

;

;;Prosperous mining market;

;

;Data show: National lithium mine new projects in 2022 The increase in reserves mainly comes from Jiangxi, accounting for 94.5% of the increase. This is due to the lithium ore prospecting competition carried out in Yifeng County-Fengxin County in Yichun region.

;

;Since 2021, 12 geological teams from Jiangxi Province have invested more than 1,200 engineering and technical personnel and more than 100 drilling rigs in simultaneous construction. Rao Xiaopeng, leader of the drilling team of Maoling Mining Area in Yifeng, said that during the implementation of the project, "wall chart" operations were implemented. Every time a hole is completed, the number is "sold" on the map, and the footage of each drill hole will also be marked on the wall. After more than two years of exploration, a total of 4 super-large-scale and 6 large-scale lithium deposits have been discovered in the Yichun area, with more than 8.58 million tons of lithium resources submitted.

;

;The fruitful lithium ore prospecting results have effectively promoted the vigorous development of Yichun's lithium battery new energy industry. At present, there are 238 lithium battery new energy production companies in Yichun City, covering lithium mining and processing, positive and negative electrode materials, separators, lithium-ion batteries and accessories, battery recycling and other complete industrial systems, forming a "lithium resource-lithium salt-lithium material- Lithium battery-lithium application-lithium recycling" full industry chain development model. From January to October this year, Yichun City’s lithium battery new energy industry achieved operating income of 88.034 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 2.45%.

;

;Bo Zhiping, director of the Mineral Resources Protection and Supervision Department of the Ministry of Natural Resources, said that in the new round of mineral prospecting, mineral exploration will focus more on clean energy and strategic emerging industry resources. The lithium ore prospecting in Yichun is an example of my country's mining companies deploying new energy and resource deep processing fields: in order to promote exploration and development and increase reserves and production, nearly 20 lithium ore blocks in Sichuan, Yunnan, Xinjiang and other provinces are actively being sold In the preliminary preparation work, we will continue to expand the sources of blocks through various channels such as prospecting target area evaluation and submission to provincial natural resources authorities.

;

;“Mining enterprises are the main body of mineral exploration and shoulder the important task of increasing reserves and production.” Deng Guoping, director of the Mining Rights Management Department of the Ministry of Natural Resources, said that the Ministry of Natural Resources has strengthened policy support to adjust development paths for mining enterprises. Provide guarantees: Effectively reduce the burden on enterprises, the "Measures for the Collection of Income from the Transfer of Mining Rights" has been officially implemented. The method of collection has been changed from a one-time collection when the mining rights are obtained to a year-by-year collection mainly based on sales revenue during mine production; standardize the mining rights transfer system, "Mining Related supporting documents such as "Guidelines for Setting Market Benchmark Prices for Rights Transfer Income" have been released one after another to improve mineral resource exploration and mining policies.

;

;In the first half of this year, national investment in solid mineral and oil and gas mineral exploration increased by 17.2% and 7.5% respectively year-on-year; 242 new exploration rights were established, a year-on-year increase of 25.4%. Deng Guoping said that encouraging "mine-based prospecting", canceling the separation and change restrictions on exploration rights, and relaxing restrictions on the transfer of exploration rights will allow more geological exploration units and enterprises with technology, ability, and willingness to obtain exploration rights, thereby accelerating the Exploration and development and increasing reserves and production will secure the main position of ensuring energy supply.

;Our newspaper, Beijing, November 27th  (Reporter Liu Zhiqiang) The reporter learned from the National Development and Reform Commission on the 26th The General Office of the State Council recently forwarded the National Development and Reform Commission's "Implementation Plan for the Construction of Embedded Service Facilities in Urban Communities" (hereinafter referred to as the "Plan"), proposing to embed functional facilities and adaptive services in the public spaces of urban communities (communities). Promote high-quality and inclusive public services at the grassroots level and into communities.

;

;The "Plan" proposes that community-embedded service facilities provide community residents with one or more services such as elderly care, community meal assistance, housekeeping convenience, health services, sports and fitness, culture and leisure, and children's recreation. . In accordance with the principles of precision, scale, and marketization, we will prioritize and focus on providing urgently needed services to ensure convenience, affordability, and guaranteed quality, and gradually supplement other services.

;

;According to the "Plan", the implementation scope of urban community embedded service facility construction projects covers all types of cities, with priority being given to large cities with a permanent population of more than 1 million. Taking into account factors such as population distribution, work foundation, and financial resources, about 50 cities will be selected to carry out pilot projects, and about 100 communities in each pilot city will be selected as pilot projects for the construction of community embedded service facilities. By 2027, on the basis of summarizing the experience and practices and effective construction models formed in the pilot, it will be steadily and orderly rolled out to other cities and more communities, gradually realizing that residents can enjoy high-quality universal public services nearby.

;

;The "Plan" focuses on scientific planning and reasonable layout of community service facilities, increasing resource integration and intensive construction, expanding facility construction space through multiple channels, improving the functional configuration of community embedded service facilities, and actively promoting social stock resources. Standardized construction requirements have been put forward in terms of transformation and utilization, sound and sustainable construction and operation models, and increasing the supply of high-quality community services.
